description.ruby-sapphire:
An unavoidable punch that
is thrown from shadows.
description.emerald:
An unavoidable punch that
is thrown from shadows.
description.firered-leafgreen:
The user throws a
punch from the
shadows. It cannot
be evaded.

the shadows.
The punch lands
without fail.
